alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alleghany, northern Ashe Counties in northwestern North Carolina, and southwestern Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Whitetop, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Whitetop... Mouth Of Wilson... Laurel Springs... Volney... Rugby... and Grayson Highlands State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for northwestern North Carolina...and southwestern Virginia. Additional statements will be issued as conditions warrant.
